step1.title: Welcome to AniTra
step1.subtitle: Let's start with some information about your farm
step1.whyInfoText: Your region allows us to suggest veterinarians, breeds and products adapted to your geographical area.

step2.title: Your species
step2.subtitle: What species do you raise?
step2.selectSpecies: Select one or more species to personalize your experience
step2.selectAtLeast: Please select at least one species to continue
step2.canModifyLater: You can modify this selection later in the settings.

step3.title: Your veterinarians
step3.subtitle: Select your usual veterinarians to find them easily
step3.localVetInfo: This veterinarian will be added as private data visible only to you.
step3.optionalStepInfo: You can add or modify your veterinarians at any time in the settings.

step4.title: Setup complete!
step4.subtitle: Here is your configuration summary
step4.readyMessage: Click "Go to my farm" to discover your dashboard and register your first animal.
